name: Hotel Exposition Tour Eiffel

reviews.text: Have been there for a short weekend trip with my brother. We were both satisfied with the service of the hotel.
reviews.title: Perfect hotel for short stay, close to Eiffel tower

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was on the 4th floor, standard double room. It was a nice, but small room. Really clean, also the rest of the hotel. There is an elevator, so it's easy to reach one of the 6 floors.
reviews.title: Great value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only 5 mins by foot to the next metro stations and only 10 mins to the Eiffel tower! Makes it really easy to get wherever you want.
reviews.title: Lovely boutique hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was buffet. Cost: 10 € for one person, for one morning. This is actually ok, if you compare it to buying your food in a Boulangerie. Fresh bread, croissants, toast, some sweet Danish patries, orange juice, coffee, milk, cereals, ham, different sorts of cheese, marmelade, different fruits, and so on... enough to find something for everybody!
reviews.title: A mixed opinion

reviews.text: As I said before, the room was small. We had a french bed, which means 140cm x 200cm. Ok to sleep in if you have a short stay. There was no closet in the room, so don't bring too much stuff with you. The bathroom was separated by glass walls from the rest of the room, but there were curtains to close that.
reviews.title: Good location, hotel needs some work

reviews.text: My experience mirrored that of most previous reviewers. A pleasant and quiet small hotel in a nice district, a short walk from metro stations and the Eiffel Tower, with plenty of decent restaurants, bars and shops in the neighbourhood. The room was small (but not unreasonably so), clean and was well serviced. The staff were consistently friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Small but very satisfactory for a short stay

reviews.text: I did not try the breakfast, not because the 10Eu charge was out of line with other similar hotels but because I ate well on each of the evenings I stayed and wanted only a cup of coffee. I will be very happy to stay here again on future visits to Paris.
reviews.title: Charming friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a small hotel, located within walking distance of the Eiffel Tower and the Trocadero, and very well served by a number of metro lines. The staff were quite friendly and accommodating. The rooms were very comfortable, with great beds, but they are not large. It is a good situation for a family because we were given "deux chambres communicante" and that worked out very well. The glass walled bathroom is a bit funky! Breakfast spread is decent but at 10 euros per person not cheap. However they did discount the kids. Neighborhood in the 15e is not my favorite, but I did like the hotel.
reviews.title: Perfect location! Clean and typically French!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved our 6 night stay at Hotel Exposition Tour Eiffel. The front desk was very helpful - even answered my questions via email before we arrived. It's close to a Metro station. The room was modern and we received clean towels and a freshly made bed every day. They offered breakfast but we ate at the local bakery down the street. The room was small but the bed was comfortable and it was very quiet! Perfect!
reviews.title: Nice clean, modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the hotel early around 10am, and to our surprise our room was ready. We thankfully had a car service take us from the train station to the hotel - which were not close to each other - but I suspect we could have taken the Metro if we had to.
reviews.title: Didn't meet our expectations
good hotel near eiffel tower
reviews.text: stayed in this hotel recently with my wife and toddler son. rooms are a bit small but overall experience was good. near to eiffel tower in a peaceful locality. staff is good and helpful. buffet breakfast lacks variety and can be improved.

reviews.title: A Nice Place to Come Home to after the Crowds
reviews.text: Pros:

reviews.title: nice hotel in a quiet neighborhood
reviews.text: 1. Great for family with older kids. We booked two rooms...one for our 2 teens and 1 for us...and that was far cheaper than one room at most other hotels.

reviews.title: Probably the best in the area
reviews.text: 2. This is all you need in Paris. With so much to see, it seems silly to waste money on a high-end hotel with all the amenities....save that for a beach vacation.

reviews.title: One week in Paris
reviews.text: 3. Location: Very quiet, family-oriented neighborhood with many shops, bakeries, and restaurants in walking distance. I felt like I got a taste of the local life and it was so nice to get away from the tourists! Metro station close by....get a multiple day pass....highly recommended! Walkable to Eiffel Tower...about 15-20 min walk.

We have stayed here twice, 2 years apart and found this to be a great location for ecploring PAris. It is close to a choice of 2 Metro's (Charles Michel) and walking distance o Eiffel Tower. The rooms are always clean, and we have had a family room which allows the children to have a bathroom and we close an extra door in the hallway to create a passageway way joining the 2 rooms. They have allowed us to access our room ealier, leave luggage stored after we check out, and alway helpful organising taxes etc. Would always choose this for the price, location and comfort.
reviews.title: Great location, very clean and helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful 5 day stay here. Although the rooms are on the smaller side, they are clean and given fresh sheets and towels daily.
reviews.title: Economical, well located and pleasant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were very helpful, only a few of them speak English, but guide books and hand signals help :)
reviews.title: Nice place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Walking distace to Eiffel tower, Statue of liberty, Garden of Trocadero etc. Closest two metros are Duplex and Charles Michels.
reviews.title: Acceptable for a couple nights

reviews.text: For a two star hotel this place is really great. Small rooms, but very clean, quiet and with good service. The location is good too - being very close to two metro stations with acces to all of Paris. There are plenty of nice little shops and restaurants close to the hotel, so eating out was not a problem. I can highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Would stay again

description: Hotel de L'Exposition is in the 15th arrondissement, situated on the Left Bank near the Eiffel Tower and the Charles Michel metro station.
